publicationStmt.p: Published as part of ELTE Verskorpusz

div.div_rhyme: aabbccbbddbbddbbeeeeddffggccddhhffdibbjj aaaaaabbccccdd aabbccddeeccffaaffaagg aabbcc aabbccaadddd aabbccbbddbb
div.head: Tekintetes nemes Abaúj vármegye örömünnepére
div.p: Horret adhuc animus, manifestaque gaudia differt, Dum stupet, et tanto cunctatur credere voto!
